wikipedia_page.main: Philip Nelson  (1872 – 1953) was a 20th century physician, antiquary and collector of ancient cuneiform tablets, coins and stained glass most of which is now held together at the Liverpool Museum under the title of the Nelson Collection.

response: *Philip Nelson (Wisconsin politician) (1891–?), Wisconsin state Senator from 1931 to 1943
*Philip Nelson-Ward (1866–1937), British Royal Navy officer and courtier
*Philip Nelson (antiquarian) (1872–1953), British founder of the Nelson Collection
